tool_description: Generates comprehensive player engagement metrics including DAU/MAU ratios, feature usage, progression rates, and custom engagement scores based on configurable parameters.

metric_types.description: Types of engagement metrics to calculate

custom_weights.description: Custom weights for different engagement factors

feature_list.description: Specific game features to analyze for engagement

error_messages: Empty player data: At least one player data record must be provided.
Invalid metric types: Must contain supported metric names [dau_mau, session_frequency, feature_usage, progression_rate, retention_score, custom_engagement].
Invalid time window: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
Mismatched weights array: custom_weights length must match number of engagement factors being weighted.
Invalid threshold values: Must be between 0 and 1, and in ascending order.
Invalid normalization method: Must be one of [z_score, min_max, percentile].
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
usage: Provide player_data and metric_types arrays. Configure time_window, custom_weights, threshold_values, and other parameters as needed. Returns comprehensive engagement analysis with scores and classifications.

player_classifications.description: Engagement level classifications for each player

metric_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of individual engagement metrics

trend_analysis.description: Engagement trend analysis over specified period

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations based on engagement analysis
